titleStmt.title: The life of the most learned Father Paul, of the Order of the Servie ... translated out of Italian by a person of quality.
Vita del padre Paolo. English
titleStmt.author: Micanzio, Fulgenzio.
Saint-Amard, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley and Richard Marriott ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation by John Saint-Amard of: Vita del padre Paolo. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Attributed to Fulgenzio Micanzio. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Pages 3, 35 and 53 are tightly bound; p. 11-12 are torn, and p. 53 has print faded in filmed copy. Beginning-p. 59 photographed from Bodleian Library and inserted at the end.
